chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
eqTerm_imp_eqT: forall a b : Term A n, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b

Goal:
forall p q : list (Term A n), eqP p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q

Premises:
eqT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
canonical : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive eqP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := eqP0 : eqP (pO A n) (pO A n) | eqpP1 : forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q) Arguments eqP (_ _)%list_scope Arguments eqpP1 _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
eqTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope

plusTerm_comp_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b c)
T1_multTerm_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
eqTerm_plusTerm_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b ->...-> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b d)
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
canonical_cons : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l))

```coq
intros p q eqPpq.
induction eqPpq as [|a b p q eqab eqpq IH].
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. apply ltp_eqp_comp with (p:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (q:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q).
  + apply IH.
  + apply canonical_pX_eqT; auto.
  + apply ltT_dec; auto.
Qed.

original: intros p q eqPpq. induction eqPpq as [|a b p q eqab eqpq IH]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply ltp_eqp_comp with (p:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (q:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q). + apply IH. + apply canonical_pX_eqT; auto. + apply ltT_dec; auto.
